subject: Re: [PATCH 2/2] cxl/region: Unregister auto-created region when assembly fails

reviews.author: Alison Schofield (author)
reviews.summary: The reviewer, Alison Schofield (author), pointed out that the region remains registered but disabled when assembly fails, preventing DAX from registering the memory. They suggested unregistering the region on assembly failure to release the resource.

reviews.author: dan.j.williams
reviews.summary: Reviewer dan.j.williams raised concerns that the patch may block DAX operation, suggested rethinking the insert_resource() in __construct_region(), and proposed userspace-driven cleanup of partially assembled regions.

reviews.author: Gregory Price
reviews.summary: Reviewer Gregory Price raised concerns about potential races and complexities in the auto-region assembly path, particularly for complex setups like interleaving.
